articles.description: Cottle found fame with his touring circus and later bought Wookey Hole in Somerset.
articles.content:
image captionGerry Cottle (centre), pictured in 1994, found fame in the 1970s with the touring Gerry Cottle Circus
Circus owner Gerry Cottle has died aged 75 after contracting coronavirus, his agent… [+1390 chars]
